O Centro PEN Galicia concede o oitavo Premio Voz de Liberdade a Marina Mayoral

06 Nov 2019, 23:10


Marina Mayoral é a gañadora do oitavo Premio Voz de Liberdade do Centro PEN Galicia. O xurado tivo en conta tanto a traxectoria literaria da académica de honra como a súa defensa do dereito de expresión e opinión e do papel das mulleres nas letras e na sociedade en xeral.



Marina Mayoral no pleno extraordinario de ingreso na Real Academia Galega como membro de honra. Fonte: RAG

O xurado, composto por Luís González Tosar, Ánxela Gracián, Bieito Iglesias, Xabier Castro Martínez, Inma López Silva, Pablo Rubén Eiré, Luis Menéndez, Xosé Ramón Pena e Manuel Guede, valorou a obra literaria da escritora, as súas achegas sobre Rosalía de Castro, Emilia Pardo Bazán ou Valle Inclán e, "sobre todo, a súa constante defensa do dereito de expresión e de opinión e a reivindicación do papel da muller no ámbito da literatura e na sociedade en xeral", salienta o Centro PEN Galicia nun comunicado.
Marina Mayoral recollerá o premio, unha peza orixinal de Azisclo Manzano, no transcurso dun acto literario que terá lugar na segunda quincena de novembro.

The PEN Galicia Center awards the eighth Voice of Freedom Award to Marina Mayoral

06 Nov 2019, 23:10


Marina Mayoral is the winner of the eighth Voice of Freedom Award from the PEN Galicia Center. The jury took into account both the literary career of the academic of honor and its defense of the right of expression and opinion and the role of women in letters and in society in general.



Marina Mayoral in the extraordinary plenary session of the Royal Galician Academy as an honorary member. Source: RAG

The jury, made up of Luis González Tosar, Ánxela Gracián, Bieito Iglesias, Xabier Castro Martínez, Inma López Silva, Pablo Rubén Eiré, Luis Menéndez, Xosé Ramón Pena and Manuel Guede, evaluated the literary work of the writer, her contributions on Rosalía de Castro, Emilia Pardo Bazán or Valle Inclán and, "above all, their constant defense of the right of expression and opinion and the vindication of the role of women in the field of literature and in society in general", emphasizes the PEN Galicia Center in a statement.
Marina Mayoral will collect the prize, an original piece by Azisclo Manzano, during a literary event that will take place in the second half of November.
